players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: remained silent.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Charlie's accusation is false. Vote Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Alice was killed by mafia. Diana stayed silent, likely protecting mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob, if you were detective you wouldn't lie about me. Charlie, you accuse Bob but he claims to have investigated you. That points to you being mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you can't be detective because you would have known your own role. Also, you are the only one who knows Charlie's role. You are lying."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Charlie's accusation is false. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Alice was killed by mafia. Diana stayed silent, likely protecting mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob, if you were detective you wouldn't lie about me. Charlie, you accuse Bob but he claims to have investigated you. That points to you being mafia. Vote Charlie."
You: "Bob, you can't be detective because you would have known your own role. Also, you are the only one who knows Charlie's role. You are lying."
